meanings: slap a person[someone in the face] with a smile
A smiling house will have good fortune

vlive.korean: 오늘 밤은 후회로 가득한 밤이지만 내일은 웃으며 다시 시작해볼까? Although tonight is a night full of regrets, should we start again tomorrow with a smile? 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : #2019 #밤황치열시 #part.17 #DJ황치열
vlive.english: Although tonight is a night full of regrets, should we start again tomorrow with a smile?

vlive.korean: '웃으며 인사해'라는 곡도 한... The song "Goodbye with a Smile"... 듣기 View video HIGHLIGHT : 우리답게, 웃으며 인사해
웃으며 걸리는 거야? - 이게 뭔데? You lose if you laugh? - What is that? 듣기 View video EXID : EXID의 봄날 나들이💖
vlive.english: You lose if you laugh? - What is that?

examples.korean: He said nothing, merely smiled and watched her. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 아무 말도 하지 않고 그저 웃으며 그녀를 지켜보기만 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: ‘No,’ he said with a grin. 듣기 Add to Wordbook “아냐.” 그가 씨익 웃으며 말했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: ‘You’re crazy!’ she laughed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook “너 미쳤구나!” 그녀가 웃으며 말했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: He turned around, grinning hugely. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 크게 씨익 웃으며 돌아섰다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
